CHAT.comment: SUSAN JINKS, Petitioner v. RICHLAND COUNTY, SOUTH CAROLINA.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:27 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT S. PECK ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY A. LAMKEN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS INTERVENOR
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANDREW F. LINDEMANN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
(Whereupon, at 12:15 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter [*43] was submitted.)
